titleStmt.title: A defence of the charter, and municipal rights of the city of London, and the rights of the other municipal cities and towns of England directed to the citizens of London. / By Thomas Hunt.
titleStmt.author: Hunt, Thomas, 1627?-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin, near the Black Bull in the Old-bailey.,

notesStmt.note: Reproductions of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York (985:12) and Sutro Library (3018:16).
In part an attack on John Dryden's play, The Duke of Guise. cf. Dict. Nat. Biog.
